org.openimaj.image.feature.local.detector.pyramid

Interface OctaveInterestPointFinder<OCTAVE extends Octave<?,?,IMAGE>,IMAGE extends Image<?,IMAGE> & SinglebandImageProcessor.Processable<Float,FImage,IMAGE>>

  • Type Parameters:
    OCTAVE - Type of underlying Octave
    IMAGE - Type of underlying Image
    All Superinterfaces:
    OctaveProcessor<OCTAVE,IMAGE>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractOctaveExtremaFinder, AbstractOctaveInterestPointFinder, BasicOctaveExtremaFinder, BasicOctaveGridFinder, DoGOctaveExtremaFinder, FirstBandDoGOctaveExtremaFinder, InterpolatingOctaveExtremaFinder

    public interface OctaveInterestPointFinder<OCTAVE extends Octave<?,?,IMAGE>,IMAGE extends Image<?,IMAGE> & SinglebandImageProcessor.Processable<Float,FImage,IMAGE>>
extends OctaveProcessor<OCTAVE,IMAGE>
    Interface for objects that can detect interest points within an octave.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      • getCurrentScaleIndex

        int getCurrentScaleIndex()
        Get the current scale index within the octave. Index 0 is the first level of the octave.
        Returns:
        the current scale index.
